actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt certain real property used in farming or in other businesses from the estate tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from a decedent's gross estate for purposes of the estate tax the value of certain real property used in farming or in other businesses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt certain real property used in farming or in other businesses from the estate tax.
